des: "Nice variation on a timeless recipe. This makes a great dish for a potluck without the worry of a duplicate dish!"
ins: Combine mayonnaise, salad dressing, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Stir in the coleslaw mix and bacon. Add the tomatoes, and toss gently. Cover, and refrigerate for 1 hour or overnight before serving.
